title: Paracelsus his Aurora, & treasure of the philosophers· As also the water-stone of the wise men; describing the matter of, and manner how to attain the universal tincture. Faithfully Englished· And published by J. H. Oxon.
author: Paracelsus, 1493-1541.
publisher: printed for Giles Calvert, and are to be sold at the Black Spred Eagle, at the west end of Pauls,
